    com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview  
    com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation  

    • Uses of SVAnimation in com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview

      Methods in com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview with parameters of type SVAnimation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SVSlide.startAnimation(SVAnimation animation)
      Start the specified explicit animation on the slide.

    • Uses of SVAnimation in com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation

      Subclasses of SVAnimation in com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SVAnimationSet
      This class provides the functionality for creating composite animations by allowing different types of animations to be combined including other SviAnimationSets.
      class  SVBasicAnimation
      This class provides the basic functionality for animating changes to one Property Animation Type at a time.
      class  SVKeyFrameAnimation
      This class implements keyframe animation.
      class  SVSpriteAnimation
      This class provides the sprite animation functionality, which is created from a texture atlas.
      class  SVTransitionAnimation
      This Class is responsible to make all the transition animation.
      Methods in com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation with parameters of type SVAnimation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean SVAnimationSet.addAnimation(SVAnimation animation)
      Add the specified animation to the animation set.
      void SVAnimationSet.removeAnimation(SVAnimation animation)
      Remove the specified animation from the animation set.
